text: Professor Anders Peter Ravn (29 October 1947 – 1 August 2019) was a Danish computer scientist. Between 1969–73, Anders Ravn was a teaching assistant in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Copenhagen (DIKU). From 1972–76, he was a systems programmer on minicomputers at the early Danish computer company A/S Regnecentralen. He returned to academia and rose from assistant professor (1976–80) to associate professor (1980–84) at DIKU. Ravn died on 1 August 2019 in Copenhagen at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Danish writers Category:Computer scientists
title: Anders P. Ravn
